text: Francesco Colonna (1597 - 29 Jun 1653) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Castro di Puglia (1642–1653)."Bishop Francesco Colonna" Catholic- Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved July 15, 2016 ==Biography== Francesco Colonna was born in Milazzo, Italy in 1597. On 16 Jun 1642, he was appointed during the papacy of Pope Urban VIII as Bishop of Castro di Puglia. On 29 Jun 1642, he was consecrated bishop by Giulio Cesare Sacchetti, Cardinal-Priest of Santa Susanna. He served as Bishop of Castro di Puglia until his death on 29 Jun 1653. ==See also== *Catholic Church in Italy ==References== ==External links and additional sources== * (Chronology of Bishops) * (Chronology of Bishops) Category:17th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Urban VIII Category:1597 births Category:1653 deaths
title: Francesco Colonna (bishop)
